content.query:
-- CREATE EXTERNAL TABLES AS SELECT (CETAS)
-- What is the distribution of primart contact count
USE woca_ldw
GO 

IF OBJECT_ID('gold.PrimaryContactDistCount') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.PrimaryContactDistCount
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.PrimaryContactDistCount
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = woca_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'gold/PrimaryContactDistCount',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
    DISTINCT(COUNT(1)) AS primary_contact_assi
FROM silver.Individual i
LEFT JOIN silver.FamilyMembership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
LEFT JOIN silver.Family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family)
WHERE f.primary_contact IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY f.primary_contact
ORDER BY primary_contact_assi DESC;
